{"title": "Zen Bound", "title_search": "zen bound", "title_keyword": "zen bound", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/zen-bound/", "summary": "Zen Bound™ is a calm and meditative puzzle game about wrapping wooden sculptures with rope. A game in which a high score is not the goal - instead it is something to focus on and enjoy at your own relaxed pace.  It is a tactile experience: a game of wood, stone and rope with the most beautiful graphics yet seen on the iPhone. The visuals complement the controls to provide interaction that feels natural and comfortable.  A major element of the game is the unique, dusty and soothing down-tempo soundtrack designed and composed by 'Ghost Monkey'. It features binaural processing that creates an enveloping soundscape when headphones are used.  Zen Bound™ is different - an alternative and subtle gaming experience that is difficult to describe. But in its own small way, it defines what gaming on the iPhone can be.  FEATURES: - The most beautiful graphics yet seen on the iPhone - 3D models that almost feel 'tangible' in your hand. - Intuitive and natural multi-touch controls (tilt supported) - 76 levels included (Tree of Reflection, Tree of Challenge, Tree of Nostalgia) - A captivating 22-minute downtempo soundtrack from 'Ghost Monkey' - Game soundtrack 'Bound' available as a free download to all customers in uncompromising 320kbit MP3 quality - Touch the 'Secret Exit' button in the main menu to download the free soundtrack.  See the gameplay video at: zenbound.com  For the latest news, please follow us: www.twitter.com/chillingo  Also available from Secret Exit: SPiN - Super Shape Puzzle *BEST PUZZLE GAME of 2008*-IGN Wireless Awards  Zen Bound™ is developed by Secret Exit and published by Chillingo Ltd  Here are some outstanding reviews:  *EXCELLENCE IN 3D* IMGA (International Mobile Gaming) Awards winner 2009  *BEST iPHONE GAME* & *AUDIO ACHIEVEMENT* Double finalist in IGF Mobile 2009 IGF (Independent Games Festival)   “This is one of the best games you can buy for your iPhone - I recommend Zen Bound to each and every iPhone gamer.”– Incredible, 9.5/10 -ign  “Editors Choice 5 stars - An amazing puzzle game that was designed purely for the iPhone.” -MacWorld  “Zen Bound is an interactive poem which organically ties together contemplative gameplay and beautiful presentation” 10/10 Platinum Award - Pocketgamer", "genre": ["Logic Puzzle"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-03-09", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-111613-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-111613-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Secret Exit (Developer)", "Chillingo (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": "E"}
